title: The Gary Null Show
content:
The recent harassment of whistleblower attorney Jesselyn Radack and Whistleblowing today under the Obama... <!--more--> Administration Louis Clark is the President and Corporate & Financial Accountability Director of the Government Accountability Project, the nation’s largest whistleblower protection and advocacy organization.
As the president of GAP, Louis frequently negotiations with government and corporate officials on social reform initiatives to protect whistleblowers and protect employees.
He also handles numerous cases of widespread financial fraud.
Louis received his JD from American University and received honorary fellowships for his work on prison reform.
. Prior to becoming an attorney, Louis was a Methodist minister having received his divinity degree from the Pacific School of Religion. The website is Whistleblower.org
